name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: seq.io.sort.factor
description:
The number of streams to merge at once while sorting
      files using SequenceFile.Sorter.
      This determines the number of open file handles.

name: dfs.qjournal.start-segment.timeout.ms
description: Quorum timeout in milliseconds for starting a log segment.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.encrypted.key.cache.size
description: Size of the EncryptedKeyVersion cache Queue for each key

name: hadoop.registry.zk.retry.times
description: Zookeeper connection retry count before failing

name: dfs.balancer.max-iteration-time
description:
Maximum amount of time while an iteration can be run by the Balancer. After
    this time the Balancer will stop the iteration, and reevaluate the work
    needs to be done to Balance the cluster. The default value is 20 minutes.

name: dfs.datanode.restart.replica.expiration
description:
During shutdown for restart, the amount of time in seconds budgeted for
    datanode restart.

name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns
description:
The Secondary NameNode or CheckpointNode will create a checkpoint
  of the namespace every 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns' transactions, regardless
  of whether 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.period' has expired.

name: mapreduce.input.fileinputformat.list-status.num-threads
description:
The number of threads to use to list and fetch block locations
  for the specified input paths. Note: multiple threads should not be used
  if a custom non thread-safe path filter is used.
